thread.title: Volodymyr

author: Volodymyr
title: Volodymyr
text:
1. Problem with luggage from Amsterdam to Tbilisi. (ABS avalanche safety equipment has been rejected but in IATA it's allowed. This equipment has been registered month before flight regarding to the rules. Georgian Airways doesn't follow IATA rules.)
2. Checkin Staff had been rude to passengers in Tbilisi.
3. Luggage problems again in Tbilisi.
Georgian Airways - never again!
